name: Rescue Squad (Immersion Studio)
description:
Welcome to Rescue Squad, the hilarious arcade game where you can be a hero and save the day with your three firefighter friends! Bounce your way through each level, catching fire extinguishers and rescuing people from the flames.

Here are some of the exciting features of Rescue Squad:

Unique characters: Meet the characters of Rescue Squad, each with their own special abilities and personalities!

Challenging levels: Each level of Rescue Squad is unique and challenging, with different obstacles to overcome and people to rescue.

Colorful graphics: Rescue Squad features bright, colorful graphics that will bring a smile to your face.

Catchy soundtrack: The upbeat soundtrack will keep you energized and motivated as you try to save the day.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of gaming, Rescue Squad is a game that you won't want to miss. Download it now and join the fun!

Ready to be a hero? Join the legendary Rescue Squad in this epic arcade-style game! Bounce, rescue, and extinguish!

PC controls: 

UI buttons - mouse left click

Move trampoline  - arrow keys or A, D

Jump - Space

Please note that this is a demo version of the game. The full version is available on Google Play
